text: Éditions Elyzad is a Tunisian publishing house, with its headquarters in Tunis. Founded in 2005, it publishes French literary works. Associated personalities include leïla Sebbar, Tahar Bekri, Sophie Bessis, Cécile Oumhani and Théo Ananissoh, and it also has a role to play in discovering new talents such as Yamen Manaï, Ilf Eddine or Azza Filali. In 2011, Elyzad received the Alioune Diop prize from the Organisation internationale de la Francophonie. ==References== ==External links== *Official site Category:Publishing companies of Tunisia Category:Organisations based in Tunis Category:Mass media in Tunis Category:2005 establishments in Tunisia Category:Companies established in 2005
title: Éditions Elyzad
